title: On-line Resident Portal (see Resident Services tab)
posting_body: ['Virtual and Contact-Free Leasing and Move-In Available', '- Self-Guided Tours with Lockboxes', '- FaceTime/Skype Tours', '- Apply & Sign Online', 'APARTMENTS IN SOUTHERN SUBURB OF DETROIT', 'STERLING HEIGHTS', 'Spacious living areas, updated furnishings, and energy efficient appliances are what you’ll find in our one- or two-bedroom floor plans.', 'Maple Grove offers comfort, affordability and convenience in one beautifully manicured, tranquil community.', 'In-home amenities like individually controlled AC and heat, walk-in closets and beautifully designed kitchens with oak cabinetry are just a few of the benefits of living in Maple Grove of Sterling Heights.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 68', 'OR Text', '68', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'Want more info on this unit?', 'See the link (below):', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 800 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Walk-in closets', '- Soft hued paint accented with white paneled doors', '- Satin nickel hardware throughout residence', '- Large picture windows fitted with designer selected blinds', '- Resident storage located on-site', '- Updated lighting throughout the apartment home', '- Spacious living room and bedrooms featuring plush neutral carpet', '- Beautifully designed kitchen featuring oak cabinetry, GE white appliances and dark walnut vinyl plank flooring', '- Controlled Access to Building', '- Accent walls in living area of apartment home', '- Well-designed floor plans ranging from 800 to 1000 square feet', '- Dishwashers available in select homes', '- Brick buildings and traditional architecture', '- Gas range in all apartment homes', '- Common laundry room with full size GE wash and dryer', 'Community Amenities', '- Pet friendly - cats and dogs- limited dog approved buildings and restricted breeds do apply.', '- Common laundry room with full size GE wash and dryer', '- Professionally landscaped', '- On-line Resident Portal (see Resident Services tab)', '- Beautifully designed outdoor swimming pool and expansive pool deck', '- Exercise room with flat screen television', '- 24-hour Maintenance Response Guarantee', '- Easy access to shopping', '- On-site management', '- Easy access to freeways', 'Pet Policy', 'Dogs allowed in limited buildings', 'Breed restrictions do apply', '$200 security deposit / $100 refundable after move out', '$30 monthly pet fee', 'Cats - $20 monthly pet fee', '$200 security deposit / $100 refundable after move out', 'Income Requirements:', 'Two and a half times the rent', '30 days of most recent income pay stubs', 'Driving Directions', 'South side of 15 mile, in between Van Dyke and Hoover', 'Office Hours', 'Mon-Fri 9:00 am - 6:00 pm', 'Sat-Sun 10:00 am - 6:00 pm', 'Maple Grove Apartments', '34824 Birch Grove Road, Sterling Heights, MI, 48312', 'iUk9SXNf6rom']
